quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: What's this?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Looks like a red wire.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Hmm. It wasn't here before.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Well it's a computer Dwight, computers have wires.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Yours doesn't.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Doesn't it?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: No, it's going in a different direction then the other wires.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Dwight, I am really busy, I can't talk about this anymore. [Dwight follows red cord through office past Phyllis' and Stanley's desks]

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: Dwight, get out of here!

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.line: What are you doing?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: I got 500 feet of red wire at a flea market up by Dunmore High School. 20 bucks for the whole spool. Crazy, what a deal. [behind Jim, Dwight climbs telephone pole] Oh he'll be fine. I made it up there.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: What you talking bout, Wallace? [imitating What you talking bout Willis]

quotes.speaker: David
quotes.line: Hi Michael how are you?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Hi, I am well, how are you?

quotes.speaker: David
quotes.line: So listen, as you know, we haven't yet filled the regional supervisor job.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh, have you not?

quotes.speaker: David
quotes.line: Correct. And I was wondering if I could get you to do some of the field work that would normally go to the supervisor [Michael makes exaggerated oh-my-gosh face at camera]. There is an area from Carbondale to Marshbrook, where we have never done any business.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: David
quotes.line: There is a small company there, Prince Paper. I can't get a report on it because it's not a public company. But we have been talking about going after their market, so I was hoping you could do some fact finding for me.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Okay.

quotes.speaker: David
quotes.line: I'll fax over some of the things we're looking for.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Fax, why don't you just send it over on a dinosaur?

quotes.speaker: David
quotes.line: Look, this is important, Michael.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh, well, then, email it to me.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: You've got no taste Stanley Hudson.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.line: Oh, I do.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: What are you guys talking about?

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.line: Some actress, whether shes hot.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Who is the gal in question?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: Hillary Swank.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.line: Ah, Hillary Swank.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: [most of office huddles around print out of Hillary Swank, judging her hotness] Not at all.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.line: She's got mean eyes.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Have you seen her with her bangs?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: She looks like a monster.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Guys, she is a beautiful movie star, so maybe we should just go to work.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.line: She is an amazing actress.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: That is not the question.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: She's not hot.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Yeah, thank you Phyllis.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Okay, okay, okay. Why don't we just put this to a vote, and then we'll be done with it.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.line: I'm not voting.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: [snaps back] No one cares. Who thinks that Hillary Swank is hot, raise your hand. [half of office raises hand] Okay, and who thinks Hillary Swank is not hot, raise your hand. [other half of office raises hand]

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: [counting votes] Five. Five to five.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Thank you, accounting department.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: So what do we do now?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: [riding in car with Michael] What if the owner of Prince Family Paper has a beautiful daughter and we have to seduce her in order to get their secrets?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I will seduce her.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: No, I wanna seduce her.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No, I will seduce her.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Please Michael, please.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No, I got it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: You'll fall in love with her.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yeah, so what if I did? That would take precedence and I would expect your support.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Okay, let's go over the plan again.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Alright, I am a local business owner. [Dwight nods along] I need to buy paper.  I find out everything about their prices and policies

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Your fictitious name?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Michael Scarn.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: I am a paper salesman looking for a new job. I find out everything about their expenses and salaries.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Okay.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Then we meet at the Denny's...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: [interrupting] No.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: ...and then we compare notes.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No, no, I never said Denny's. IHOP.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: No! [arguing over each other]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: You know how I feel about IHOP.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh, don't start,

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Are you socialist?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: You know what? I don't want to get into this debate again. I enjoy IHOP.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: I'll have a cup of a coffee.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: You will have pancakes and you'll like it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Store only has three employees.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: So what?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: It means they are not expanding.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Maybe they are shrinking.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: They could be shrinking.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: No because their sign is centered perfectly above their store. No sign of the sign being moved.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Ah ha [popping something in his mouth] Yup.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: [spying through binoculars] Its lunch time, and no sign of anyone coming in or out. Which means they are not taking new customers out to lunch.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Mm hmm .

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Which Means they're not acquiring new business. So once again no growth.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: And there are clouds. There are clouds in the sky, which means gonna rain, bad for business.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Oh, it would if they were all cumulous and not cirrostratus.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Argh, why are you all...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Get your clouds right.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Shut up.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: So you go in now, I am going to go in exactly ten minutes. We have never met each other. We are complete strangers. Also, we are going to need a signal to bolt out of there if there is danger. Lick ur lips, try it. [Michael licks lips] No, no like this. [Dwight starts and Michael follows passionately licking their lips] Good.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Ready to do this?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Good. Here come the sharks. [they imitate jaws theme sounds and Dwight makes shark fin on his forehead]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: In nature, there is something called a food chain; it's where the shark eats a little shark. And the little shark eats a littler shark. And so on and so on. Until you get down to the single cell shark. So now replace sharks with paper companies and that is all you need to know about business.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Hello.

quotes.speaker: Entire Prince family
quotes.line: Hello, hi.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: My name is Michael Scarn. I am a local business owner and I would like to find out about your company.

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: Oh, please come in

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: What kind of business are you in.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: We are a law firm.

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: I assume your primary paper needs are stationary, general office.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: You know, I will be honest with you... about something. Where we used to live, our paper supplier had a lot of big clients and I just didn't feel like a priority. So I guess my question [reaches for paper in his pocket with questions on it] for you would be [reading off sheet] how many clients do you have?

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: About 80.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Really? That many? This doesn't seem like a very big operation.

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: It's just me, my wife and my son.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Ah, so when did you set up shop?

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: I opened this place after I came back from Vietnam.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh Vietnam, I hear it's lovely .

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: [muted] Mmhmm. [shrugs]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Each side will have three minutes to prepare opening arguments. Topic: Hillary Swank is attractive.

quotes.speaker: Entire office
quotes.line: Hot!

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: The debate is whether she is hot.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.line: What difference does it make? Attractive, beautiful, hot, we're talking about the same thing here.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Huge difference. A painting can be beautiful, but I don't want to bang a painting.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Okay, TMI.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: So, even specialty paper, say 94 brightness double-bonded, you would put that on the same truck as your conventional stock?

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: You sure know a lot about paper for a lawyer.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Well that is... because... I am a genius.

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: Oh really?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yes, well about some things, and other things I am very stupid. Like, watch this. Is this the cup? [picks up tape dispenser and makes drinking motion] Is this the cup? [picks up a stapler and makes drinking motion] Is this what I drink out of? [glug noise, both laugh] Laughter is my job, tears are my game, law is my profession.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Hello, I would like to apply for a job.

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: Hi, I'm afraid we're not hiring right now.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Why don't you just get rid of this guy? [points to Prince Son]

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: That's my son.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: I'm your son now; you can visit him on holidays. Dwight Schrute, I'm a paper salesman at a second tier paper company called Dunder Mifflin.  I'm the top salesman there and I'm looking for a new challenge. I would say you guys have what, 40 high full volume clients?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Try 80.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Pshaw, that's nothing. I've 90 clients myself. You had better look out, someone might run you out of business.

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: I sure hope not.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Me too. [smirking]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: I think all of us have a tendency to view celebrities as sort of mythical figures, you know? We don't really see them as real so therefore we don't judge them as real people.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Are you serious? Jim, just show us a picture.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Kevin, c'mon.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: Yeah, shut up Kevin.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: He's making all these fancy, uh, it's a gut thing.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Kevin, you know what, why don't you close your eyes? Imagine that Hilary Swank comes into this office for real and she walks over to you [in a more and more seductive voice] and says Kevin Malone, I just read your online profile and there is nothing I would rather do then make out with you right now. And now you tell me something, is she hot? [Kevin gets up to join the "hot" team to their great joy] Does that end the debate?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: [Kevin sits down, gets right back up and heads back to "not hot" team] No, it's is she hot, not would you do her. Respect the game.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.line: Oh my God.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: [fingers opened an inch] This close.

quotes.speaker: Prince
quotes.line: Grandfather: So why are you considering leaving Dunder Mifflin?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: My boss, his insensitivity might border on cruel. This is a man who does not listen to the needs his underlings. [Michael takes offense and charges over]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Hey, hey, how is your interview going?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: It's going very well.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Don't blow it. Hey Linda, can I get a picture of you?

quotes.speaker: Linda
quotes.line: You want a picture of me?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I would, could you just stand over here? That would be great [positioning her towards sign of Prince Family Paper customers] Just a little something to remember the trip by. A little to your left [positions Linda to get better picture]

quotes.speaker: Linda
quotes.line: Can I get a copy of that?

quotes.speaker: Prince Granddaughter
quotes.line: Grandma, I can't do this.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: What's going on?  Little homework over here? Lets see if I can help. Huh, math, that's not so hard. Ok. There are 4 of these, ignore the parenthesis, right?

quotes.speaker: Prince Granddaughter
quotes.line: Right.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Why is this little 2 so small? It's, it's weird, you don't, you just go by the x. The x means times. 4 times x 2. What is double 4?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Excellent! Way to go! Nice! [Michael and granddaughter Prince exchange high fives]

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandmother
quotes.line: Don't put that. [granddaughter Prince erases and corrects answer]

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Ladies and gentlemen, even though the penis was fake, I was expecting a second plot twist where we found out Hilary Swank was a boy.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: [disapprovingly] Kevin!

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.line: Ok, I wasn't going to dignify this discussion by getting involved, but I don't even get the discussion, hot is a temperature people. But Kevin deserves to lose for what he said, so, yes, she's hot, she's hot as heck, she's a female Boris Becker.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: OH! [the "yes she's hot team" claps]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh, well thank you very much for all of your help. It's going to be an incredibly hard decision.

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: Wait; let me get something for you. Here is some, some references. Here is a list of references, our top clients. You call any of them; I trust you will hear some good things.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I... Okay, okay, okay, [in disbelief] alright, thank you. [heads towards Dwight, makes make out lips signal]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: [both making make out lips at each other] Excuse me sir, I took the bus here and was wondering if I could catch a ride home with you in your car.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Of course. Thank you very much. Thanks for your time.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Thank you very much.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I cannot wait to contact your clients.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Thank you for your time I look forward to getting your calls. [hurrying out door]

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: Bye bye now. So long.

quotes.speaker: Dwight and Michael
quotes.line: Oh my God, oh my God, oh my God. [running out door]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Haha, we struck the mother load!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Cmon.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Wallace is going to freak.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: All their top clients I can't believe it.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: He's going to absolutely freak.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Someone's looking out the window. Go go, Peel out, go. [car hits front divider, screeching]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh shoot.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: You drove over that. Go back [car hits divider, screeching]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh God, what was that?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: That's not good.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: No, no, no no. Shes hot, okay? Because if you are saying Hillary Swank isn't hot, then you are saying that I am not hot. Because obviously I am not as hot as Hillary Swank! [Kelly runs away in tears]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Oh my God.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Aw, it's alright.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Oh man,

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Aw, my car.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Not good.

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: Is everyone okay?

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandmother
quotes.line: It sounded bad.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No no, we are fine. You have done enough already.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: You've done more then you can possibly know.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Just, shut up. You know we are just going to call a tow truck, so...

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: A tow truck is going to charge you one hundred bucks to take you a mile.  Let me take a look.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No, no, really not necessary.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: He drove over the divider and then backed over it and caused the..

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: I'll be right back I'm just going to grab my tool box.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Ladies, are we prepared to let the Kevins of the world decide anything for us? Anything at all? We don't even give him full internet access.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: [surprised] Wait, what?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: See that, the obvious symmetry of the face? That's a natural appeal of the scientific standard of coin aphelia, features that are a composite average of many features. Yes, she is attractive, but is not hot.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: How much longer is this going to take?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: You know let me give you some money for this.

quotes.speaker: Prince Son
quotes.line: No, I work at a desk all day, its nice working with my hands.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh coffee, that's too much. [Dwight drinks it]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: This is disgusting, what is it this, instant?

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: Well that outta do it. [bumper is heavily duct taped to the car]

quotes.speaker: Prince Granddaughter
quotes.line: Its all better.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Prince Grandfather
quotes.line: Gosh, well so long. [they exchange byes]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: I look forward to hearing from you about that job application.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Ok, goodbye Prince Family.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Goodbye prince family, [to Michael] should be called the Sucker family. Here you go shark, let me fix your fin for you and sharpen your teeth while I'm at it. [Dwight laughs evilly, Michael seems remorseful] Bye bye.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: [punches Michael on the arm, beckons to Michael for high five, does not get it, high fives himself, smiles contently]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: [entire office is chatting] I'm saying, all I'm saying is Kevin is not necessarily a feminist, is all I'm saying.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: No, because... [Dwight and Michael walk in and march into Michael's office, silencing the conversation]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Dwight, what will happen to that family if I call David and give him this information?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Its simple, David would use that information to destroy them.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Ok. You know, our sales are fine. We're doing fine. They're doing fine.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: They could do better.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Why don't we just, live and let live?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: What?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Live and let live.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: I'm not familiar with that expression,

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: It's from James Bond.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: It doesn't make sense, of course I'm alive.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I'm not going to make this call.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Michael, you have to. Have you ever seen a lioness devour its cub? Have you ever seen a baboon devour its mate?  Have you ever seen a raccoon devour a squirrel?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: My heart says...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Your heart is a wonderful thing, Michael. But it has made some terrible decisions.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: That is true.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Yes.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: That is true. We have gone down the wrong path many many times.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Jan... Ryan.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Yeah, save your heart for love, and use your brain for business, right? If we don't do this to prince paper, someone else will. Worse yet, someone else will do it to us.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.line: I am trying to be more optimistic in life. I've got what, 20 or 30 years left. And my family history says I have less. Now, the old Stanley Hudson would have found something wrong this actress. But that is no way to live life. Look at this healthy sexy pretty strong young woman. C'mon people! She is hot.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: There was a terrible war, ugh, so many died. Far too many died. But if Frodo hadn't destroyed the ring, then goodness itself might have died.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: You're right.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: You are right. I will call David and give him the customer list and I will give him all my info.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Good, so, [Michael takes client list and heads out of office] where are you going?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Just something I have to do first.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Where are you taking the client list?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Somewhere safe, where it can't hurt anyone [starts running, Dwight follows]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Michael, Michael, no. Michael, give that. Michael, don't do this. No. [chasing Michael out of the office into parking lot]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh shoot! [gets to his car turns around]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Freeze, give me the list! [still chasing him back into office where Michael grabs his car keys from his desk and heads back to parking lot]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: No no no, I can't let you do this!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Those people will be ruined. [runs out back door]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Its business, not personal. [they run back outside, where Dwight gets paper from Michael]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Give it, give it. We can't do this to those people.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Its over, Michael, its over. [holding list of clients up]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Im not a shark.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Okay, it is time for the final votes. All of those in favor of resolution Hillary Swank is hot? [half of office raises hand] Okay. And all those opposed? [he skips back and joins other half of office in raising hand]

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: This is ridiculous.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: That's the thing about debating, you're just going to get people more entrenched in the view they had in the first place. [two sides of the debate start arguing]

quotes.speaker: David
quotes.line: This is good stuff Michael. You are a titan of industry pal.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: [pained] Mpfh.

quotes.speaker: David
quotes.line: Good work.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Thank you.

quotes.speaker: David
quotes.line: Look I'll be in touch, thanks buddy.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Okay, bye bye.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Guess whose stock just went up, golden boy?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I guess this is what they call a bittersweet moment. It is bitter because I slightly destroyed a wonderful little family. But sweet because David Wallace thought I did a good job. That's what I hate bittersweet chocolate. I don't even... what's the point of that? Why not just sweet? Who are you helping?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh, hey what is this?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Hillary swank.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh, she is hot. ["Hillary Swank is hot" supporters cheer]
